mapper.insert: INSERT INTO payment_tb ( MEM_IDX, pmt_product, pmt_product_qty, pmt_product_amt, pmt_date, pmt_product_cd, pmt_aid, pmt_tid, created_at, approved_at ) VALUES( #{memIdx}, #{pmtProduct}, #{pmtProductQty}, #{pmtProductAmt}, NOW(), #{pmtProductCd}, #{pmtAid}, #{pmtTid}, date_sub(#{createdAt}, INTERVAL 9 hour), date_sub(#{approvedAt}, INTERVAL 9 hour) )
mapper.select: SELECT p.*, m.kakao_sid FROM payment_tb p INNER JOIN member_tb m ON p.mem_idx = m.mem_idx WHERE ( (p.pmt_product = 'prm' AND DATE_ADD(DATE(p.pmt_date), INTERVAL 1 MONTH) <= DATE(NOW())) OR (p.pmt_product = 'first' AND DATE_ADD(DATE(p.pmt_date), INTERVAL 7 DAY) <= DATE(NOW())) ) AND m.payment_r_yn = 'Y' AND p.pmt_date = ( SELECT MAX(pmt_date) FROM payment_tb WHERE pmt_product = 'prm' AND mem_idx = p.mem_idx or pmt_product = 'first' AND mem_idx = p.mem_idx ) AND m.kakao_sid IS NOT NULL GROUP BY p.mem_idx, p.pmt_date, m.kakao_sid ORDER BY p.pmt_date DESC LIMIT 0, 1000;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO payment_tb ( MEM_IDX, pmt_product, pmt_product_qty, pmt_product_amt, pmt_date, pmt_product_cd ) VALUES( #{memIdx}, #{pmtProduct}, #{pmtProductQty}, #{pmtProductAmt}, NOW(), #{pmtProductCd} )
mapper.select: SELECT p.*, m.customer_uid FROM payment_tb p INNER JOIN member_tb m ON p.mem_idx = m.mem_idx WHERE ( (p.pmt_product = 'prm' AND DATE_ADD(DATE(p.pmt_date), INTERVAL 1 MONTH) = DATE(NOW())) OR (p.pmt_product = 'first' AND DATE_ADD(DATE(p.pmt_date), INTERVAL 7 DAY) = DATE(NOW())) ) AND m.payment_r_yn = 'Y' AND p.pmt_date = ( SELECT MAX(pmt_date) FROM payment_tb WHERE pmt_product = 'prm' AND mem_idx = p.mem_idx or pmt_product = 'first' AND mem_idx = p.mem_idx ) AND m.customer_uid IS NOT NULL GROUP BY p.mem_idx, p.pmt_date, m.customer_uid ORDER BY p.pmt_date DESC LIMIT 0, 1000;
